alert.note: Alert for Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Watauga County through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm near Deep Gap. This storm was drifting very slowly to the southwest around 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Boone... Deep Gap... Todd... Sands... Aho... and Rutherwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
